attributes.action: John Bercow is no longer fit to be Speaker after insulting the US President.
attributes.background: The Speaker’s comments are harmful to out relationship with the US. The President is the elected leader of the UK’s closest and most important ally. He loves Britain, has put Winston Churchill back in the Oval Office and put us at the front of the queue for a post-Brexit trade deal.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you're asking Parliament to do. If you like, you could sign the petition below, which asks the House of Commons to debate a vote of no confidence in the Speaker:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183279
